projects.name: Web Developer
projects.descr: While in high school I started doing websites with PHP, which turned into a pretty good freelance gig. Worked for e-commerse company for 8 months and another 4 for an open source business focused social network, multiple project based short term contracts.

projects.name: Software Engineer / Head Of Technology - Xoomworks

Joined as Software Engineer, grew into a technical lead role focused on the entire software development lifecycle. Designing distributed systems and data pipelines.
Managing people, teams, coaching senior engineers.

projects.name: Principal Software Engineer - Financial Times
projects.descr:
Led the B2B Engineering department's growth from 2 to 6 teams while maintaining enterprise accounts and developing new products for FT's Professional portfolio.

Enhancing content with machine learning backed classification models to produce Analytics and Intelligence products.

We shipped an experiment for a new sitewide semantic search tool that turned into a conversational AI product based on FT's knowledge graph.
projects.tech: Go, JS, TS, AWS, ECS/Fargate, Postgres, ElasticSearch, Python
